name: Infinite Rainbow Tower Smash!
description:
Ludum Dare 47!

Made in 48 hours as a part of LD47 with the theme "Stuck In A Loop": https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/infinite-rainbow-tower-smash

Summary and Controls

Restore the Rainbow to it's full colour! Smash, crash and dash your way through the infinitely looping tower as you try to bring it's colour back!

[W]: Jump

[A]/[D]: Move Left/Right

[SHIFT] + [A]/[D]: Dash Left/Right

[S]: Smash to Next Floor

Tools Used!

All created by myself from scratch during the event!

Programming/Engine: GameMaker Studio 2.

Art: Combination of draw functions, GMS2 sprite editor, GIMP2.0 and MS Paint.

Music: Created in LMMS.

SFX: Generated from BFXR.
